title: Hello, {{name}} here!!! Welcome and let me tell you what is going on.
presentation: As you can see, this is a Beta version. That’s because there’s still a lot of features that I intend to implement here. For now, you can check the following sections:

welcome_items.label: My GitHub repositories. If you are learning about programming, data science and/or statistical learning / machine learning, there’s a lot of content there to give you ideas.
Blog posts I've written related to cyber security, open source, productivity, and development. (Only in Portuguese for now)
Some fun widgets I've implemented to give you ideas and to have fun.
If you want to reach me out to work together or with questions / suggestions, feel free to fill the contact form. You can also find me in social media platforms:

coming_soon.title: Coming soon
coming_soon.desc: And what features I intend to have here in the future? Here are some of them:

soon_items.label: Implement the web api to automate fetching my GitHub repos and to allow the implementation of other widgets that need a back-end server to work better.
Create a "Videos" section with tutorials / programming courses.
I will translate my articles to English and Spanish, but first I'm thinking about hosting my own blog instead of posting it on Dev, that way I'll have more flexibility.
I want to create a cool logo! Ideas?
I have a lot of ideas, but we'll see when we get there.

about: By the way, this project is public on GitHub. Fork it!!!
